Parent Org (Unauthorized): Alabama State Council on the Arts
Notes: The Alabama Center for Traditional Culture collects archival and manuscript material related to the traditional and folk culture of the state to support its program for research and presentation of the state's folklife.  Genres collected include folk music and dance traditions (gospel, blues, old-time fiddle music, polka, and Southeast Asian); oral traditions (storytelling, oral history, and jokes); material culture (folk art, traditional crafts, and folk architecture); and folk beliefs (medicine, weather lore, and superstitions). Sound records, motion pictures, still pictures, manuscripts, and printed material appear.
Source of Repository Data: Alabama Department of Archives and History
